overview: The film is a tribute to Pier Paolo Pasolini. In Bangkok, an assassin misbehaves during a mission and kills one of the accomplices without knowledge of his other partner in crime. Two heroin sisters posed to avenge and hunt the perpetrators who killed their beloved sister. Involuntarily they enter into a complicated labyrinth full of accomplices and supporters who are only a tool in someone else's hands. Everything is being controlled by a ruthless, manipulative and obscure organization.
tagline: They'll teach you not to shine, but shine instead!
title: Useful Idiots
